summary.title: Summary
summary.info: Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in web development, specializing in REST APIs, microservices, and full-stack developments. Strong problem-solving skills and a versatile mindset that enables effective collaboration with various individuals.

Web Technologies: React, Angular, HTML5, Responsive Design
